description:
The Marduk was the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] flagship of Rear Admiral http://anidb.net/ch901 [Sandle Alarcon]. Pennant number 813C.
The Marduk accompanied the reinforcements led by Admiral http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli] at the Eighth Battle of http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn] in 798 UC. Though the Alliance Fleet defeated the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Imperial] forces, both Rear Admirals Alarcon and http://anidb.net/ch808 [Guen van Hugh] took their fleets in pursuit of the Imperial remnants under Admiral http://anidb.net/ch236 [MÃ¼ller]. However, they were ambushed by the fleets of High Admiral http://anidb.net/ch193 [Mittermeyer] and http://anidb.net/ch194 [Reuenthal]. The Marduk was blown in half, and the front portion of the ship collided with an Alliance cruiser, killing Alarcon.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Marduk
